SHALL contain [1..1] Episode Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.41)

SHOULD satisfy: In Problems Section, a Problem Act SHOULD contain a Problem Observation.
SHOULD satisfy: In Alert Section, a ProblemAct SHOULD contain an Alert Observation.
